actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make grants to eligible organizations to provide service dogs to veterans with severe post-traumatic stress disorder, and for other purposes.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

titles.title: Puppies Assisting Wounded Servicemembers Act of 2017
Puppies Assisting Wounded Servicemembers Act of 2017
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make grants to eligible organizations to provide service dogs to veterans with severe post-traumatic stress disorder, and for other purposes.
